boardgame.name: Dragonfire
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dragonfire is a cooperative deck-building game set within the world of Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons. Players choose from a number of races _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; from dwarf to elf, half-orc to human _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; while assuming the quintessential roles of cleric, rogue, fighter, and wizard. Equipped with weapons, spells, and magic items, players begin their adventure along the famed Sword Coast, then expand to other locales across the Forgotten Realms, such as Baldur's Gate, Neverwinter, and Waterdeep in future expansions. Along the way, players level up their characters, opening access to additional equipment, feats, and more. Join the quest, and build your own legend!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Current Story Road Map:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Dragonfire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. Dragonfire: Adventures – Shadows Over Dragonspear Castle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Dragonfire: Campaign – Moonshae Storms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6. Dragonfire: Adventures – A Corruption in Calimshan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7. Dragonfire: Adventures – Ravaging The Sword Coast_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;8. Dragonfire: Adventures – Sword Mountains Crypt_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansions that can be added at any time:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. listing.notes: Opened to add character pack and examine contents at gencon. Never played. Ended up with a second copy in our group.
New in Shrink - Also includes the Heroes of the Sword Coast Character Pack and the Dragonborn promo character card.
Base game, played once, all cards were sleeved. No stickers were used. $13 shipping. Ships USPS 1-3 business days after payment.
Like new, never played, but shrink-wrap removed from box. Buyer pays actual shipping costs to their location. I will send you shipping and cost options when I receive your shipping address.
Includes character pack, and Gen Con promo. A few character shields are folded slightly to make them stand up, but otherwise in very good condition. No stickers have been used.

Includes Heroes of the Sword Coast expansion and 2x GenCon Promo. Opened, sleeved in UltraPro clear sleeves, and played twice (after sleeving). Two stickers used (Still attached to character cards) but they are two that had multiple copies available. Message for shipping cost.

INCLUDES THE CHARACTER PACK DragonFire as picked up from Gencon, WITH THE CHARACTER PACK INCLUDED. NO STICKERS used. I used paper to take any notes. Everything is basically as new. Gently played, just solo. A bit tricky solo, so want it to find a new home. Buys pays shipping. Its a standard size large-ish box; it might fit into a medium flat rate box (TBD). I can ship however buyer wants. Local pickup in Boston area welcome.

This bundle includes the Dragonfire base game along with the Heroes of the Sword Coast, Wonderous Treasures, Shadows over Dragonspear Castle, and Chaos in the Trollclaws expansions. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also be including the Broken Token sleeved card organizer I bought for the game as well. The game has been played several times but there is little to no wear on any cards. Three of the character cards have had two stickers applied each. Shipping is included!!

Played with two base game characters and used 4 or 5 stickers... Removed the stickers from player screens so their looking brand new. Used stickers have duplicates - no restrictions for new players. Price in a bundle with Heroes of the Sword Coast Character Pack: 65€, same shipping costs - two expansion characters played. Stickers have been removed and have duplicates here as well. Payment via PayPal friends and family or direct bank transfer. Shipping is 5.99€ within Germany, international shipping costs upon request.
In Stock!

This listing includes the following: - Dragonfire core game (sleeved) - Dragonfire: Character Pack - Heroes of the Sword Coast (sleeved) - Dragonfire: Wondrous Treasures (sleeved) - Dragonfire: Adventures - Shadows Over Dragonspear Castle - Dragonfire: Adventures - Chaos in the Trollclaws - Dragonfire: Hidden Treasures promo pack The core game, character pack, and Wondrous Treasures have been opened, sleeved in Premium Mayday Games sleeves, organized together in the box, and played twice (no marks ever made on character sheets, no stickers ever applied). There are also some extra sleeves in the box in case any split. The Shadows Over Dragonspear Castle expansion has been opened and perused, but never played. The Chaos in the Trollclaws expansion is still new in shrink. The Hidden Treasures promo pack contains all 52 cards. Players are supposed to receive one of these when they attend a store demo, but this is the full pack. It has been opened and perused, but never played with or shuffled in. Will ship in the US and calculate shipping once a zip code is available.
Auction win for phasmtis only.

Very close to new, a few characters have a single sticker on them. Sale includes: Dragonfire: Adventures – Chaos in the Trollclaws (2017) Dragonfire: Adventures – Shadows Over Dragonspear Castle Expansion (2017) Dragonfire: Wondrous Treasures (2017) Dragonfire: Hidden Treasures (2017) Dragonfire: Character Pack – Heroes of the Sword Coast (2017)

This is a bundle pack. It includes: 1)Dragonfire base game 2)Heroes of the Sword Coast 3)Wondrous Treasures 4)Shadows Over Dragonspear Castle Components are in baggies with labels on them. Campaign stickers were never used. Free shipping to the US.

Set includes everything released to retail for Dragonfire, all stored in the base Dragonfire box: Base game Heroes of the Sword Coast Wondrous Treasures Trollclaws Dragonspear All cards sleeved in premium sleeves [10 packs] Plastic storage for tokens One promo card from Hidden Treasures No insert I can throw in a built broken token sleeved card organizer for an additional $35 which is perfect for this. I have a very lightly-used copy of Dragonfire for sale, a cooperative deckbuilding card game by Catalyst (the creators of Shadowrun Crossfire)! All the cards have been sleeved since day 1 and are in pristine condition! Some of the components have never even been used, including the sticker sets for the character sheets. I have it available to the first buyer at a steal of a price! Enjoy!
sold at auction mint condition, played a few times.

this is for igneusmortia for auction win for Dragonfire.

Played but all stickers are unused. Box and components are in great condition. Includes the expansions: Heroes of the Sword Coast Shadows over Dragonspear Castle (halfling character missing, double copies of moon elf) Chaos in the TrollClaws Wondrous Treasures Hidden Treasures (54 treasure cards, looks complete but the BGG-site says there should be 55 cards so perhaps on card is missing)
Opened but never played. Shipping rates will vary based on location.

Never Played. Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete including the original instructions are also present. Never been played so none of the stickers have been removed. The decks of cards are still sealed. The tokens have been punched and stored in a ziploc bag. Box has a little storage wear and has a small label on the box top but overall the box is in very good shape. Plastic storage tray/box insert is also present. Big box, will not fit in a flat rate so shipping could be high if you live far away from Missouri.

Played once. Game was fully sleeved in black, red _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; white Dragon Shield Matte sleeves prior to play. The game will remain sleeved. Was purchased at GenCon 2017 so DOES contain the Elf-Druid Promo Character. Also contains the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Character Pack – Heroes of the Sword Coast_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; expansion that was being sold at GenCon 2017 in the box. In addition to all that goodness this sale also includes the following NEW IN SHRINK: Hidden Treasures Wondrous Treasures Chaos in the Trollclaws Adventure Pack Shadows over Dragonspear Castle Adventure Pack I am not interested in splitting this lot up. Buyer pays shipping using whichever service they would prefer. I am in Chicago, IL (Zip Code 60625) if you would like to estimate what the shipping costs would be. I am not a store! I do not have shipping rates at my fingertips so it takes me exactly as much time as it would take you to figure out how much it would cost to ship using whichever service you prefer. The game weighs approximately 6.25 pounds so figure an extra pound or so of packing material. I have several items for sale at the moment. Discounts on both the games and shipping if you purchase multiple items! See my listings here: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/Rapscallion_69
This is not for the base game. This is for one copy of the promo Githyanki Fighter class from GenCon 2018. Shipping or Local Pickup (Nashville, TN) available.
This is not for the base game. This is for one copy of the promo Githyanki Rogue class from GenCon 2018. Shipping or Local Pickup (Nashville, TN) available.

This includes the base game and the following expansions that have been played a few times but are in great condition: Heroes of the Sword Coast character pack Shadows over Dragonspear Castle adventure pack Wondrous Treasures (adds to the magic item deck) Chaos in the Trollclaws adventure pack Sea of Swords adventure pack Everything fits easily into the base game box with plenty of room for more expansions. The cards are in a BCW box bottom with laminated dividers by card type (market, adventure, magic item rarity, etc.). I also scanned and laminated the stickers from the base game with the intention of cutting them out and using sticky tack to hold the xp feats to the player shields (instead of using stickers) but I never actually cut them out and just tracked stickers with pencil and paper. These laminated sheets as well as all stickers (all are unused) from the base game and expansions are included. I printed and laminated the free adventure found on the Dragonfire website and some other fan-made material for the Sea of Swords adventure found on BGG that are included as well. Buyer pays shipping from 65203 (Missouri) to the USA.

Includes core game, Shadows over Dragonspear Castle Adventure Pack, Heroes of the Sword Coast Character Pack, Wondrous Treasure pack. A few stickers have been used, and the game is in great shape. My cat liked to sit on this box in particular for some reason, and she knocked this one off the dining room chair, so one of the corners is a little mooshed, but not bad. All Dragonfire deck cards and magical items cards are sleeved because the card stock used wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t great and would nick and chip fairly easily. This is a great game and this package is a great way to get started! Shipping will be via USPS large flat rate box.

Up for grabs is a copy of Dragonfire with the following: Heroes of the Sword Coast Character pack Shadows over Dragonspear Castle and Chaos in the Trollclaws. Some of the character sheets have been used, however, I used Crayola washable markers (1 included), which comes off really easy with just a little water and a towel. This also has a custom foamboard insert I made to hold the cards, it is super handy. Thanks for looking! Shipping will be $15.00.

This includes the base game plus: Character Pack - Heroes of the Sword Coast Character Pack - Heroes of the Wild Wondrous Treasures Campaign: Moonshae Storm Adventures - Shadows Over Dragonspear Adventures - Chaos in the Trollclaws Adventures - Sea of Swords Adventures - Corruption in Calimshan Adventures - Ravaging the Sword Coast Adventures - Sword Mountains Crypt

Also included in the box are the Heroes of the Sword Coast character pack, the Wondrous Treasures pack, and the Shadows over Dragonspear Castle adventure pack. The original insert is gone, but there is a foamcore one that I made in the box. Shipping will be $18.90 (large Priority flat rate box). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to accept payment through PayPal or Venmo.
